name: You Stupid - Simple Math
description:
Are you Maths Expert or Stupid? Pass through this unique test and check your Maths Skill!

You have 5 Seconds to check "Correct" or "False" in the each quest! The Game seems simple but its one of the most brain teaser game!

Some of the salient features are:

- Addition and Subtraction and Multiplication Quest
- Mixed mode for Addition and Subtraction
- Game Center Enabled: Compare your scores and challenge your friends!
- Randomly Generated Quests
- Simple sound effects to provide feedback
- Share your score via Social Media.


Have Fun!
